plot: Young Walter works in the copy room in the back. He lives for one thing and one thing only: that call from his connection announcing the arrival of something new, something that will blow his mind: Imperial Orange.
title: Imperial Orange
plot_es: Young Walter works in the copy room in the back. He lives for one thing and one thing only: that call from his connection announcing the arrival of something new, something that will blow his mind: Imperial Orange.
plot_en: Young Walter works in the copy room in the back. He lives for one thing and one thing only: that call from his connection announcing the arrival of something new, something that will blow his mind: Imperial Orange.
